name: Xorn (TBM)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive perception 16

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.desc: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through. Casting move earth, earth tremor, erupting earth, or earthquake on an area containing the xorn flings the xorn 30 feet in a direction of the casterâ€™s choosing and the xorn is stunned for 1 round.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Treasure Sense
traits.desc: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack or one stomp attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: The xorn stomps creating rippling earth in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 1d6+3 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Xorns are rocky skinned burrowers that live on the Elemental Plane of Earth, continuously consuming raw materials found in the endless expanse. With a voracious appetite for treasure, they may not be beyond bargaining for their meals, but their 3 claws and serrated maw means they can take it by force when needed. Caves with xorns nearby are often filled with gems for later consumption.
